title: Non-aural set, minuet trio - compositional device

content.prompt: Which of the following compositional devices is featured prominently throughout the excerpt?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements
